name: Vandstrøm
description:
Description

Vandstrom is a relaxing structure system and puzzle game where you make a lovely and consistently developing river scene by setting tiles. Investigate an assortment of brilliant biomes and track down a chilling experience.

Credits

Patrick Stengel - Programming,

Leon Kämmerling - Programming,

Yannick Späder - 3D Artist,

Nils Weibel - 3D Artist,

Samuel Eyasu - 3D Artist,

Marcus Theobald - 3D Artist,

Carsten Wenskus - Sound Design and UI Design

Nguyen Anh-Thu -Texture Artist,
